What happens if you execute an app that contains the following bootstrap file? Please choose the correct answer.
 <script src="resources/sap-ui-core.js" id="sap-ui-bootsrap" data-sap-ui-libs="sap.m" data-sap-ui-xx-bindingSyntax="complex" data-sap-ui-resourceroots='{"sales.reporting":"/"}'></script>

options.text: The application will run without a theme
Will NOT load and show an error
Customer-defined default theme will be used

correctAnswer: The application will run without a theme
